name: George Floyd
description: George was an African-American man who was born in Fayetteville, North Carolina. He was a father of two daughters. He was killed in the Powderhorn community of Minneapolis, Minnesota.

name: Eric Garner
description: Eric Garner (September 15, 1970 â€“ July 17, 2014) was an African-American man. He had been a horticulturist at the New York City Department of Parks and Recreation, but quit for health reasons.
